there's a legend about how the pot
sticker was originally made the royal
chef was making dumplings for the
emperor but as he started to cook the

get the sauce
he went downstairs and when he came back

and the dumplings were sticking to the
bottom of the pot he had no choice but
to scrape the dumplings off the bottom
